Text: I uploaded this torrent because it works not because it is tiny.If you check for other 3d desktops for XP like Madotate (works also with windows 9X and 2000 free here: http://www.softlookup.com/display.asp?id=26041) you'll see that thay also are very small.
for you any noobs that dont know this is a 3d form of alt tabbing and it works wonderfully.
Top Desk is a good program (has some conflicts with gaming though) loved it when i had xp but now i have the real deal much better with vista ultimate
